Nerangs.ab: barsom pad barsomdān bē hilišn zōt ud rāspīg harw dō yaθā ahū vairiiō dō bār guftan
"He (the zōt) has to put the barsom on the barsomdān. Both, zōt and rāspīg, should say twice the yaθā ahū vairiiō."
zōt ud rāspīg āgenēn yaθā ahū vairiiō dō guftan barsom abar barsomdān bē hilišn ātaxš niyāyišn bē gōwišn
"The zōt and the rāspīg should recite together two yaθā ahū vairiiō. He (the zōt) has to put the barsom on the barsomdān. He has to recite the Ātaxš Niyāyišn."
zōt ud rāspīg yaθā ahū vairiiō dō guftan barsom abar barsomdān bē hilišn ātaxš abrōxtan
"The zōt and the rāspīg should say twice the yaθā ahū vairiiō. He (the zōt) has to put the barsom on the barsomdān. He (the rāspīg) should kindle the fire."
